text: Antônio Salim Curiati (Avaré, Brazil, 13 February 1928) is a Brazilian physician, and politician. He was Mayor of São Paulo from 13 May 1982 to 14 March 1983. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of São Paulo Category:Brazilian physicians
title: Antônio Salim Curiati
